sentences: Paul Avron Jeffreys (13 February 1952 – 21 December 1988) was an English rock musician.

He played bass guitar in Cockney Rebel between 1972 and 1974, working on the group's first two albums, and later worked with a number of British bands, including Be-Bop Deluxe (1974), Warm Jets (1977–1980) and Electric Eels (1980–1981).
